title: Black Forest gâteau
description: Rich with fruit, chocolate and cream, this 70s classic still has a place on our tables. This recipe uses dried sour cherries, but you can substitute good quality bottled ones.
ingredients: 225g/8oz butter, softened, plus extra for greasing
2 x 80g/2¾oz packs of sweetened dried sour cherries
100ml/3½fl oz cherry brandy (ideally morello cherry brandy)
